CanvasRenderingContext2DShadowOffsetY.summary:
The
CanvasRenderingContext2D.shadowOffsetY
property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the distance that shadows will be offset
vertically.

blockquote.para:
Note: Shadows are only drawn if the
property is set to
a non-transparent value. One of the ,
, or shadowOffsetY properties must be non-zero, as
well.

CanvasRenderingContext2DShadowOffsetY.value: A float specifying the distance that shadows will be offset vertically. Positive values are down, and negative are up. The default value is 0 (no vertical offset). and values are ignored.
